title: Ink overflow
summary: The ink overflow of a box refers to the part of the box and its contents that creates a visual effect outside of the box's border box. Being visual only, ink overflow does not affect layout as it has no impact on box model properties.

parents.title: MDN Web Docs Glossary: Definitions of Web-related terms
